title: Ironic grenade gate fails: Failed to allocate the network(s)

comments.content:
http://logs.openstack.org/58/272658/58/check/gate-grenade-dsvm-ironic/3436213/logs/new/screen-n-cpu.txt.gz?level=TRACE#_2016-06-30_12_37_14_856

Probably due to this change yesterday:

https://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/e2eb6659a426bae05a54b93ebf31ff3247125258

But I don't know why that breaks ironic.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mriedem

comments.content: The virtualinterface table in the nova db has a unique constraint on the address column, so my guess is we're failing to create a vif that has a duplicate mac address for some reason.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mriedem

http://logs.openstack.org/98/335998/1/check/gate-grenade-dsvm-ironic/e8cbaac/logs/new/screen-n-cond.txt.gz#_2016-06-30_14_32_25_360

As a note, reverting:

comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~happycamp

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/336069
Committed: https://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/commit/?id=a739ca9e36c578662814667eedc211def089a2d9
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit a739ca9e36c578662814667eedc211def089a2d9
Author: Dan Smith <email address hidden>
Date:   Thu Jun 30 07:58:07 2016 -0700

    Make VIF.address unique with port id for neutron
    
    Neutron does not require global uniqueness for MAC addresses, but
    nova-network did. Since VirtualInterface was designed for n-net and
    is still used to enforce its requirements for such uniqueness, we can
    simply use the extra space in the address field to namespace our
    MAC address in neutron to avoid the constraint. We can hide this
    behavior in the object so nothing else needs to know, and we have
    255 characters in the field, which is enough for a uuid and a mac
    address to fit.
    
    Closes-Bug: #1597770
    Change-Id: I23480d98ca339c119100e8ab7df633ed8b80b1e9
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content: This issue was fixed in the openstack/nova 14.0.0.0b2 development milestone.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~doug-hellmann
